title: Parallel run with reconciliation
summary: Run legacy and new flows in parallel and reconcile outputs before cutover.

decisionGuidance.problemSolved: Complex integrations fail at cutover due to subtle differences in ordering, timing, and transformation.
whenToUse: Transactional consistency and auditability are required
whenNotToUse: The flow is low-risk and easily reversible

gotchas: Reconciliation rules can hide real mismatches
thingsToWatchOutFor.opinionatedGuidance: Define reconciliation rules explicitly and treat mismatches as learning, not noise.

complexity.rationale: Validation-heavy but reduces catastrophic cutover risk.
complexity.skillDemand: Data reconciliation and distributed tracing skills.

starterDiagram.title: Compare outputs
starterDiagram.description: Legacy and new produce results; compare.

realWorldExample.approach: Processed the same files through both paths and compared outcomes.
realWorldExample.outcome: Cutover confidence increased; fewer post-cutover incidents.
